name: Pre & Post Wash Hair Oiling Magic Value Set
about: What it is: A set of one full size pre-wash hair oil, and one mini size post-wash smoothing oil that strengthens, plumps, and provides shine for a healthier mane..Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage.- Dryness.- Heat Protection.Highlighted Ingredients:- Ashwagandha: Supports roots and hair follicles..- Amla: Hydrates and addresses hair fall..- Passion Fruit Oil: Cares for dry, damaged hair and reduces frizz..Ingredient Callouts: These products are gluten-free, cruelty-free, and come in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know: The HoliRoots™ Pre-Wash Hair Treatment Oil cares for strands and roots with ashwagandha. The MahaMane™ Smooth & Shine Hair Oil is a leave-in hair oil to smooth frizz and protect strands from heat, formulated with six potent fruit oils for instant shine and smoothness. These products contain a blend of six fruit oils for high shine, while the apoptogenic plants and an ayurvedic herbal remedy help support healthy hair. These products are also suitable for all hair types..Clinical Results: In a consumer study, led by a third-party independent lab, of 20 participants who tried the HoliRoots™ Pre-Wash Hair Treatment Oil Hair Oil over 14 days:.- 85% said their hair felt smoother.- 85% said their hair felt more nourished.- 90% said their scalp felt healthier.This Set Contains:- 1.8 oz/ 55 mL HoliRoots™ Pre-Wash Hair Treatment Oil.- 0.48 o/ 14.4 mL MahaMane™ Smooth & Shine Hair Oil.Clean at Sephora
ingredients: -Ashwagandha: Supports roots and hair follicles..-Amla: Hydrates and addresses hair fall..-Passion Fruit Oil: Cares for dry, damaged hair and reduces frizz...HoliRoots™ Pre-Wash Hair Treatment Oil: .Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Withania Somnifera Root Extract, Phyllanthus Emblica Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Orbignya Oleifera (Babassu) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Tamarindus Indica Fruit Extract, Acacia Concinna Fruit Extract, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Oil, Oenocarpus Bataua Fruit Oil, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Mauritia Flexuosa (Buriti) Fruit Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: HoliRoots™ Pre-Wash Hair Treatment Oil:.-Part dry hair..-Fill dropper with desired amount of oil and rub between palms..-Apply oil to scalp and hair. Massage into roots, focusing on the crown..-Leave on for at least five minutes or overnight for best results..-Rinse well with lukewarm water before cleansing with the HoliRoots™ Hydrating Shampoo (sold separately)....MahaMane™ Smooth & Shine Hair Oil:.-Rub a few drops into palms and apply to towel-dried hair from mid-lengths to ends..-Add more to longer or thicker hair if needed..-Comb through and style as usual..-MahaTip: Apply to dry ends and flyaways for a smooth finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a few weeks I’ve noticed my hair is a lot smoother and I have less hair fall during my washes and in between. It’s become a staple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Haven’t seen any crazy different results using the pre-wash oil but the post-wash oil leaves my hair so soft. It’s a great oil for separating my curls and leaves my hair smelling so fresh! Definitely will by the post-wash oil again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t usually write reviews but this exceeded my expectations. I only used this once and my hair is softer and shiner with noticeably less frizz. The product smells really good and isn’t so strong it’s overpowering   I bought the full sized products and I’m excited to see the long term results. Highly recommend stronoverpowering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is actually so good- it surprised me! The pre wash oil makes my hair shiny after I wash it out and I don’t really see a difference with the post wash oil, but it smells great, and the small samples of shampoo and conditioner have convinced me to buy the full size versions. sooo good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Its my second time repurchasing this oil. It really works and i have new hair growth. It made my hair stronger for sure.

reviews.review_title: Hubby & I are loving Fable & Mane
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My husband and I are both experiencing thinning hair and we enjoyed this gift set thoroughly. I love that the set was easy to use and the bottles are beautiful. I have dry, low porosity hair and his is curly and dry. We love the feel of the oils and the pre-wash oil rinses off easily in the shower. Can’t wait to continue to use and see progress. See photo for the shampoo & conditioner sample included in the box as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The hair oil is amazing. I’ve been oiling my hair every week with this and my hair looks so shiny and healthy. It also smells so good. It didn’t leave my hair feeling greasy or make it look flat. The post wash oil adds a nice shine.

reviews.review_title: The dropper makes them super easy to apply!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this hair oil set, and I absolutely loved it! It took me back to my childhood when my mom would massage my scalp before washing my hair and apply oil afterward. This set includes both a pre-wash and post-wash hair oil, and the dropper makes it super easy to apply directly to the scalp. It’s so convenient to use, and best of all, it doesn’t leave my hair feeling greasy. The oil itself is lightweight and absorbs quickly, leaving no residue, which is a huge plus for me. My hair feels noticeably shinier, more nourished, and the texture is softer and less frizzy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This duo is a must-have for healthier, shinier hair! The full-size pre-wash hair oil works wonders, nourishing and strengthening my strands before shampooing, leaving them soft and hydrated. The mini post-wash smoothing oil is perfect for taming frizz and adding that extra boost of shine without feeling heavy. Together, they make my hair feel stronger, plumper, and more manageable. Plus, the mini size is perfect for on-the-go touch-ups! Also, can we all agree that this is the PERFECT Christmas gift for every woman on your list?? Obsessed with this packaging!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this gift set. It is perfect for anyone who likes hair care. Both of these products are incredible. I love using them both to keep my hair soft and nourished. I would highly recommend this to anyone who needs you get a gift or wants to try these products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this set comes with two different oils as well as a sample of there shampoo and conditioner. This is perfect if you want to try the whole routine. I love the holiroots oil. Because it is perfect for the eczema I have on my scalp. It is moisturizing and doesn’t leave my hair oily after a wash.

reviews.review_title: A great set for healthy hair
reviews.review_text: The Fable and Mane HoliRoots hair oil is a staple in my hair routine. I love using a scalp oil to nourish my hair since I do color treat my hair and it really dries it out. Once a week I use a scalp oil to help hair growth and I love this one. I’ve gone through a whole bottle already. It’s not super heavy but I definitely notice hair growth as I have a lot of little baby hairs growing out. My hair feels softer, especially when I use the post shower hair oil. A little goes a long way, I only need a few drops. I love this hair kit cause you get to try both amazing products and I love the little bottle for travel!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Fable & Mane Pre and Post Wash Hair Oiling Magic Value Set has been such a treat for my hair care routine. The pre-wash oil is perfect for nourishing my scalp and hair before washing, and it leaves my hair feeling softer and more hydrated after rinsing. The post-wash oil adds a nice touch of shine without feeling greasy or heavy. I love that the set makes it easy to incorporate oiling into my routine both before and after washing, and it’s really helped with dryness and overall hair health. The scent is amazing too—warm and soothing! Definitely a great value if you’re looking to add some extra nourishment to your hair care regimen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've just started using the Fable & Mane Pre-Wash Hair Oil Magic Value Set, and it's a game-changer. My hair feels incredibly soft and smells amazing. The oiling process is so soothing—it's like a mini spa session every wash! Highly recommend for anyone looking to elevate their hair care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this set! I did the oiling and left it on for a full day and it actually smells very good and wasnt greasy that it got on my stuff throughout the day. I washed it and did the post wash oil and it was very nice i just advise dont add too much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this set of hair oil by fable and mane. It has a set one for before wash and one for after wash and my hair has never felt so much better. It feels so soft and looks so shiny. I will always use it

reviews.review_title: My hair looks so healthy now
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hair oil duo is perfect for my hair care routine. I love that there’s a pre-wash oil and post-wash oil. They are easy to apply, and after using, my hair feels and looks so healthy and shiny. Its a must have

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been impressed with Fable & Mane products, and these hair oils are no exception. Pre-wash oil has quickly become my new favorite. I love that I can apply it, leave it for 5 minutes, and then promptly wash my hair, and the results are fantastic. My hair feels soft and silky smooth. The post-wash oil is not heavy or greasy, and it adds shine while protecting my hair from heat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fable & Mane's Pre-Shampoo Hair Oil is a fantastic choice for dry, damaged hair. The lightweight formula absorbs quickly, delivering deep hydration and making hair more manageable. After using it, my hair felt softer and looked shinier, with significantly reduced frizz. The delightful scent adds an extra touch to the experience. Highly recommended for a nourishing boost before washing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I started noticing a balding area on my hair so I started using the pre-wash oil and I really like that it isn’t super thick because I have fine hair. It is very scented I think but I’m also very sensitive to smells. It’s just very sweet but I really like using it before a shower.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These hair oils have been making my hair feel and look so soft. I have been letting the pre wash oil sit in my hair for an hour before washing and using the post wash oil after my hair is washed. My hair looks so smooth after using the duo!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this gift set. The presentation was so elite. I used every item from the set. The oils smelled amazing. The pre-wash oil did not cause build up or affect my ability to shampoo. The post-wash oil did not leave my hair feeling greasy. Instead, it felt hydrating and gave my hair a beautiful shine. After I used the oil, I diffused my hair, and it looked more voluminous than usual. The shampoo and conditioner were my least favorite. I felt the quantity was too little for me. I have type 4 natural and dense hair and I had to reach for my personal shampoo  and conditioner to be able to wash my whole hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One full size pre-wash hair oil > It strengthen my hair for the wash and provide the necessary moisture. I leave it overnight.  One mini size post-wash smoothing oil> it locks the hydration and makes my hair shiny and smooth Love them both

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for a couple of days and I love the way that it makes my hair feel it makes you feel so smooth and so soft and I really enjoy it because it’s really affordable and it’s really good for the price and I highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great hair oiling kit! I have been on a scalp care journey for about a year or so. I have tried a lot of the popular scalp oils. This is top 2 of my favorites. This leaves your hair so soft and manageable. I love that the smooth and shine helps protect from heat. I love that this came with a sample of the shampoo and conditioner. This is a great deal for quality scalp oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fable and Mane’s is such a wonderful company i currently use their moisturizing shampoo and conditioner so im excited to try this set of a full size pre-wash hair oil, and one mini size post-wash smoothing oil.   Feels so nice in my hair as well, it helps strengthen, plump, and provides shine for a healthier curly mane. Love to add the oil to my curls and it keeps my ends fresh till my next wash day.  The pre-wash oil is amazing love giving myself a good massage to my scalp leaving the oil overnight then washing or you can leave on wash out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have flaky dandruff on my scalp and I was looking for something that would help with that. I really enjoyed trying out this kit and I really can feel the difference in my hair. My hair is a lot more shiny, but not an oily way and I love the hair oil that I can put in after it makes my hair look so healthy.

reviews.review_title: The best set I have used for my hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This set is so good for my hair! The pre wash oil makes my scalp and hair feel really healthy and strong. I love how it hydrates and helps with dryness and split ends. It’s easy to use and works even better if you leave it on overnight. The post wash oil adds so much shine and smooths my hair, getting rid of frizz. Both oils smell amazing and leave my hair looking soft and full!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I applied these oils to my hair I noticed the change! The pre-wash oil helped my scalp relax and strengthen the hair follicles so that I didn't lose too much hair when I washed it, and the oil after washing it, which I applied from mid-lengths to ends, gave me a lot of shine, softness and no frizz with just a few drops. The scent is very light but pleasant, with natural essences, very nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m especially impressed how their hair oil for shine works. It really makes my hair extremely smooth and shiny. I love the feel of my hair and even my husband noticed a difference and said you have super soft hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this kit a lot.  I’ve been using the hair oil as a pre wash hair.  I put on my scalp and leave that for a few minutes. Helps with my itching scalp. And the oil is great for shine and smoothing hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This pre & post wash hair oiling set is the perfect set I use both all the time & love them both The pre wash is so good and easy to apply as well and so is the after wash oil as well it made my hair feel sooo nice & healthy

reviews.review_title: Improved the look of my hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Fable & Mane Hair Oiling Magic Set is so well packaged - it like a gift!  It contains a full sized pre-wash hair oil and a smaller sized post-wash smoothing oil.  The HoliRoots prewash oil smells devine. I used a full dropper on my hair, first warming it in my hands and then applying to the scalp. I left it overnight and could feel that it moisturized my hair and scalp. I washed it out the next morning and could see the difference in condition of my hair.  The MahaMane Smooth and Shine hair oil was good for taming some of my flyaways and giving my finished hair some shine. Again, this had an amazing scent.  This set also contained a small sachet of Volumizing shampoo and conditioner.  I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite oil systems. I use both all the time and will continue to. The pre wash is perfect for adding onto your haircare routine. I like to leave mine on overnight before wash day. The hair oil isnt too heavy and leaves your hair looking shiny and soft.  It is a great set if you want to try the brand or perfect for gifting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this kit! I have a very dry scalp that gets irritated as it gets drier. So the pre-wash oil is a savior. It soothes and nourishes my scalp and it’s light so it’s not drowning my hair because some pre-wash oils are so heavy and thick that it takes forever to wash out. After I washed my hair, I used the hair oil before blowdrying. A little goes a long way!!! I have long thick hair and I used 4 drops on each side after parting down the middle. I already have the hydrating shampoo/conditioner but I do love that they give you samples of them with the kit to see the full effect of the whole line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical at first, my hair feels very nicely nourished and healthy after just a few uses. The application is easy, and the results are visible shiny, manageable hair that I love! I never thought of using two oils this way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite product in this box is the post oil set. I have very thick 3c hair and it gets dry very easily. I put this on to smooth out some frizz and it worked very well and was super moisturizing but soaked in and didn’t leave my hair greasy

reviews.review_title: Perfect gift for Diwali or any festivals
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Being a desi hair oiling is my routine before shower, I just love fable and mane products. This oil is made with Ashwagandha which helps to reduce the tension around the follicle. Love the ingredients and love how it makes my hair shiny and strong. This set is just perfect for Diwali.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful, simple to use hair oiling set! Fable & Mane is such a great brand with high quality hair oils. I have blonde, fragile hair and love the results from this treatment! The Christmas gift set is so cute. My hair feels softer, stronger, and shinier even after the first use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hair Oiling Magic Set Review The first thing that stuck out to me was the packaging and whole view of this set. It was adorable. The oiling set really did help my hair and I truly enjoyed it. I love that it came with both a pre-wash and post-wash oil. Many times brands or people in general tend to focus on one or the other. I think for your hair to be truly taken care of, both pre and post oils are super important. These two oils work on protecting, strengthening and overall making your hair shiner and more healthy. I am very impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My combo to oily skin lately has felt really unhappy . It’s been both dry and more congested than usual . This mask worked to clear up my pores . If also helped to balance the extra oil in my skin . Leaving more radiant skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, this is a crazy deal! You pay the same as what you would for the pre-wash treatment oil but also get the mini smooth and shine oil and a shampoo and conditioner sample. Love it! Such a great gift for yourself or someone else. I have seen these products all over TikTok and couldn’t wait to try. I have long hair that is fine in texture. I love to use a hair oil before I shampoo to protect my hair follicles. Because I have such fine hair, I typically don’t use a hair oil on my scalp because it usually leaves me looking greasy. But since this one is designed to be washed out, I gave it a try! I left it on for about 10 minutes before my shower and it washed out easily with shampoo and did not look oily after I styled. I was impressed! I love the smooth and shine oil as well. I only apply it to my ends (again because of my fine hair) but it left them soft. So amazing that this oil also has heat protectant properties. I really love this set and would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect set to gift someone this holiday season, the prewash oil is a need if your hair is damaged like mine used to be, the post wash oil leaves my hair so shiny and smooth I always I apply it before blow drying and after just in the end for a silky finish

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brand. I had never tried before but I’m glad I did. I have long wavy/curly hair. It’s usually always frizzy after I blow it out. After using this products I didn’t see a need to. I will absolutely continue to use this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a good hair oil. This one was good. It did help to keep my roots healthy and feeling flawless. only thing is to not use too much or your hair can become oily. I washed it out and I put too much in and it did cause my hair to become oily for the day. Once I figured out the right amount though, it was perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These oil smells divine! My hair is loving it. They are absolutely amazing, my hair is softer and shiner just after one application. Love the fact that they are very lightweight and easy to rinse off with no residue left on hair. Would highly recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This the first and only hair oil I’ve ever used, and there’s a reason for it. I have thin medium length hair, and I’m always trying to make it look more full and dense. Once a week, I massage the hair oil into my scalp and hair before I wash it. I usually do it that same morning and let it sit for a few hours. My hair feels very soft afterwards, and combined with taking a daily multivitamin, I’m a lot more confident that I’m setting my scalp up for success when it comes to growth. The value of this set is incredible too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite pre wash oil of all time. It makes my scalp feel so healthy and flake free. Using it over time makes my hair look shinier, healthier, and stronger. I massage it in my hair the night before I am gonna wash and let it sink in. I am telling you it makes a world of difference. It was awesome to get to use the post wash oil as well as it made my hair super soft and shiny. this is an amazing gift for anyone on a hair health journey!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this duo for the nourishment of my scalp and hair! The hair oil was new to me in that I’ve never used a pre-wash oil before. My hair is dry from using my straightener quite a bit but I felt that these two products combined provided hydration and left my hair feeling stronger and healthier after only a few uses.

reviews.review_title: Fall in love with your hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using fables and mane shampoo and conditioner and they have been working wonderfully for my hair. I recently incorporated the pre and post wash hair oil and couldn’t be happier. My hair feel so nourished and healthy after using the entire set. Definitely fallen in love with my hair all over again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hair oil set is so neat! I’ve never tried a pre-wash oil and didn’t know what to expect. Even after the first use, I noticed that my hair seems softer and more hydrated. It feels a bit softer and healthier. I can’t wait for continued results!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fable and Mane is my favorite brand and this is my favorite oil! My hair continues to grow beautifully and shiny. This is a great gift to give to your loved ones or honestly keep for yourself since it’s amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i recently tried the hair oiling magic set, and wow, it’s like a little spa treatment for my hair! my hair type is fine and a bit wavy, but it gets super frizzy and dry, especially with all the heat styling i do.   the pre-wash hair treatment oil is a game changer. i love how easy it is to apply—just part your hair, drop some oil in your palms, and massage it into your scalp and strands. it feels luxurious and not too greasy, which is always a worry with oils. i left it on overnight (definitely recommend for max hydration), and when i rinsed it out, my hair felt so soft and nourished.  then i used the smoothing oil after washing. just a few drops rubbed in my hands and applied from mid-lengths to the ends, and it really worked wonders. it made my hair super shiny and manageable, and i noticed way less frizz!   after using both products, my hair feels strong and healthy, and i’m so here for it. i can’t recommend this set enough if you’re dealing with damage or dryness—trust me, your hair will thank you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited for this set! I love using the pre wash hair oil prior to washing my hair. It makes my scalp feel soothed and balanced. I like to rub it into the scalp and let sit for about 5-10 minutes. It makes my hair so much easier to comb through which my dry hair needs. I also love using the smooth and shine hair oil on my damp hair. It makes my hair less frizzy and it provides a heat protection, which is a must since I use a lot of heat styling products. This set is wonderful and such a great value!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this hair oil set! I always use this pre wash oil before I wash my hair and it has made my hair so much thicker and healthier! it is also lightweight so does not bother my hair! this set is such a good deal I highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Love this oil &the mini size is perfect for travel
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This hair oil is amazing for my curly hair! It absorbs into my hair very quickly and prevents frizzing and breakage while keeping my hair feeling very hydrated. It also helps me detangle my hair before washing so that wash day is much smoother. Loving this formula so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has to be my new favorite discovery. I had never even heard of this brand before, but I am absolutely obsessed just after using two weeks. I can start to see the difference incorporate this daily and it will work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Excited to try this hair oil kit set. Overall, I love the feel of this product and the way my hair looks using it. My hair is quite long and also very texturize as he helps me to manage and keep it under control. I’m using this with styling products as well to make my hair look more voluminous, healthy, and shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is an awesome set if you really love hair oils and maintaining integrity if your hair I love to use this every day maximize my scalp. It does help overtime with hair growth. I love to pair with shampoo and conditioner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying this brand and I am SO excited that I absolutely adore this set!! My hair is frizzy, coarse and needs a lot of hydration. I love how effortlessly this makes my hair feel sleek and smooth. It also lasts multiple days and doesn’t make my hair weighed down or feel greasy. 20/10 recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this pre wash hair oil. My hair is pretty thing and oily but this preps my hair so well and makes it super soft after a wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am so excited to try this pre and post hair wash oil duo from this brand. My hair is unmanageable these days. This oil can make my hair less frizzy and feels like hair is more healthy after couple uses,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s always nice to have a different set because the value has increased a lot. The hair oil is really nice and goes into the hair easily and doesn’t look greasy at all. I also like the smell because it’s not super strong!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: great hair set! I use the pre wash oil the night before I wash my hair. The next morning when washing I feel it really helps make my hair feel so clean! The hair oil afterwards makes my hair feel soft without weighing it down. Love both!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a wavy hair type and fable mane oiling products have been a god sent for tackling the dry damaged hair! I use heat alot and needed some serious repair. I love the scent of all the products and how easy they are to use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Pre & Post Wash Hair Oiling Magic Set from Fable & Mane is the perfect way to experience the brand’s styling products. Both oils smell incredible and help to lock in hydration, mend splitting, and extend style.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it a lot. I have extremely dry hair and put the prewash oil on my scalp the morning of washing my hair (I don't like sleeping with it on but you can if you want). After washing, I put just few drops of the post wash oil on the ends of my hair and my hair feels much more moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this oil for so long I love using it on wash day literally makes my hair so soft and has been a great part in helping with my hair growth healthy hair journey this isn’t too heavy on hair and just overall makes it look great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this hair oil from Fable & Mane. I love how it has the treatment hair oiling set it comes with the scalp and roots, hair oil, and the shining hair oil . I have curly hair, and it left my hair bouncy and nourish and soft .

reviews.review_title: Great for pre and post shower!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This magic value set worked very well on my curly/wavy and thick hair! I loved how it made my hair feel soft and smooth after a full wash and condition treatment. I would highly recommend for anyone dealing with damaged ends or needing a full hair reset!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this hair oil set! The value of the products are so good and they come in a cute packaging. I love that it comes with a pre and post washing hair oil because it allows me to truly see improvements in my haircare routine! The pre wash hair oil works wonders and the post wash hair oil leaves my hair looking so pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The 'Hair Oiling Magic' set by Fable & Mane has transformed my hair care routine, resulting in hydrated, glossy hair. I've received countless compliments on its healthy look. Fable & Mane's products are trustworthy, and this set's lightweight oils are ideal for daily use without weighing my hair down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While it’s designed for dry or damaged hair, I believe it would work well for anyone looking to boost hydration. Overall, I highly recommend this for anyone wanting to achieve healthier, more manageable hair.

The Fable & Mane Pre & Post Wash Hair Oiling Set has completely elevated my haircare routine. The set includes two oils – one for pre-wash and one for post-wash – and both have worked wonders on my curly/ frizzy hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hair oil is honestly amazing. I love to use the holliroots on my hair in the morning, French braid and leave it in all day. When I wash it out in the evening my hair is so so soft, and so shiny. I use a little of the other oil on my ends and my hair has never looked better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great set! I used it before showering and my hair was so easy to detangle in the shower! After i washed my hair I used the post oil and it left my hair super soft and shiny! This is definitely a great deal and a beautiful set

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This hair oil set is so amazing! I love how it has 2 types of oils to help you have fully nourished and healthy hair and they do an amazing job as pre and post wash oils! I use these once a week and will let the pre oil marinate in my hair all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This pre & post wash hair oiling set is great for anyone getting into hair oiling. One bottle is a pre-wash treatment that I like to use a couple hours before washing my hair. It helps nourish my scalp & promote hair growth. The mini bottle is a post-wash hair oil that is great to use after styling your clean hair. It left my hair looking shiny & tamed any frizz. Overall, great set & would highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this set. I’ve been using the pre-wash oil for months and I have noticed my hair growing in thicker and feeling stronger. I have less breakage and overall healthier hair. I’ve recently just started using the post wash oil and it is amazing. My hair looks so hydrated and glossy. I received so many compliments on how healthy my hair is looking. I trust anything by Fable & Mane.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The **Pre & Post Wash Hair Oiling Magic Value Set** is an excellent solution for anyone looking to improve the health and appearance of their hair. This set offers a combination of oils designed to be used both before and after washing, making it a versatile addition to any hair care routine. The pre-wash oil nourishes the scalp and strengthens hair from the roots, reducing breakage and improving overall hair texture. After washing, the post-wash oil helps to lock in moisture, leaving hair soft, shiny, and frizz-free.  What I love about this product is how lightweight and non-greasy the oils are, making them suitable for regular use without weighing down the hair. After a few uses, my hair felt noticeably smoother and healthier. The set is also ideal for those with dry or damaged hair, as it helps to restore hydration and reduce split ends.  The packaging is convenient, and the oils have a pleasant, mild fragrance that isn't overpowering. Overall, the Pre & Post Wash Hair Oiling Magic Value Set delivers great value and results, leaving hair feeling nourished and looking vibrant. It's a must-try for anyone looking to improve their hair care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love how shiny, silky, and hydrated this leaves my long wavy hair feeling! It gives my hair such a hydrated feel after washing and the post wash oil keeps my frizz at bay! I love this set!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best hair products ever. I love this brand and all the ingredients and everything they do with their products. It’s definitely good to my dry hair. I use this religiously Monday through Sunday. It makes my hair look healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This hair oil is heavenly. My hair has never looked healthier and more hydrated. This is a new step in my hair care routine that I can’t go without. It keeps my hair frizz-free all day long too! Amazing product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had always been so curious about the pre wash oil and I saw this set came out and thought wow I should probably finally give this a try! I must say in combination with their shampoo and conditioner for thinning hair this has been so great for my scalp composition

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the BEST pre wash hair oil. I’ve used 6-7 bottles of this and keep coming back to this oil. It’s easy to wash out and has a pleasant scent. The oil is effective in helping with hair fall and damage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Fable & Mane's Hair Oiling Magic set is a fantastic addition to any hair care routine. It includes the **HoliRoots Hair Oil** for pre-wash nourishment and the **MahaMane Smooth & Shine Hair Oil** for post-wash shine, both inspired by traditional Indian hair oiling techniques. The HoliRoots oil strengthens hair from the roots, while the MahaMane oil adds a lightweight, glossy finish. The set also comes with a volumizing shampoo and conditioner, providing a full, luxurious hair care experience. Overall, it’s perfect for achieving stronger, shinier, and healthier hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! The way that this product smells is amazing and I love that this uses natural Ayurvedic principles! It is also so easily accessible and a good way to apply. Fable and mane is the best!
